signed his first paid endorsement deal Wednesday since pleading guilty to dog fighting charges. Unequal would not comment on what the deal was worth, and Michael Vicks representatives weren't immediately available for comment. I'm thrilled to be a part of the Unequal team, Michael Vick said in a press release announcing the agreement.
